mapper.sql: select article_no,location,writer,title,contents, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')as reg_date, good,bad,hits from taste_board
mapper.insert:
select taste_board_sequence.nextval from dual
insert into taste_board(article_no,location,writer,title,contents) values(taste_board_sequence.currval,#{location},#{writer},#{title},#{contents})
mapper.update: update taste_board set hits=hits+1 where article_no=#{articleNo}
update taste_board set good=good+1 where article_no=#{articleNo}
update taste_board set bad=bad+1 where article_no=#{articleNo}
